message.body: Hey, I have my friend's farewell party from 6 tonight, and I just got to know it. I'll leave at around 5:30, is that okay? Sorry!!
Yeah, no problem. By the way, where do you want to meet today?
Thanks! Lovers and madmen! I'll be arriving there soon!
Eh? I thought we were meeting at 4? I'll see if I can get there earlier.
Yeah, we are supposed to meet at 4. My pancake meeting was just finished earlier! I have my laptop, so you dont need to hurry:P
